Yesterday, Democrats BLOCKED another attempt by @SenateGOP to extend the #PPP. 

A program that has helped 4.5 million Texas workers stay on the payroll of businesses hit hardest by COVID-19. 

How long are Democrats going to hold COVID-19 relief hostage for political gain? https://t.co/G1XVedhOpT

This year farmers, ranchers, and producers in TX & across the country have been working in overdrive to make sure we have fresh food on our tables during the pandemic.
